messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom]
messages.msgSnippet: I am forwarding this for anyone interested in contacting Kathy with their stories... Feel free to pass it on to people you know may be interested. Thanks.
messages.messageBody:
I am forwarding this for anyone interested in contacting Kathy with
their stories... Feel free to pass it on to people you know may be
interested. Thanks.

>>
>> I HAVE TIME MAGAZINE INTERESTED IN DOING AN ARTICLE I NEED MORE
>> FAMILIES WITH LEGAL PROBLEMS THEY HAVE FACED AS A RESULT OF SCHOOL
>> DISTRICTS IGNORANCE OR JUST ANY KIND OF LEGAL PROBLEMS THAT THEY
>> FACED. THEY CAN CALL ME I AM TRYING TO MAKE THIS STORY BIG ,I WANT IT
>> BACK ON THE COVER OF TIME MAGAZINE AGAIN. PLEASE GIVE MY NUMBER TO
>> ALL, THEY CAN CALL ME AS I HAVE TO GET THEIR PHONE NUMBERS AND AND
>> STORIES READY FOR THE REPORTER. HE'S GETTING BACK TO ME IN A FEW
>> DAYS. THE MORE FAMILIES THE BIGGER THE STORY. THE SAME REPORTER DID A
>> STORY IN AUGUST 2001 COVER STORY, "Is Homeschooling good for America?"
>
>> kathy pugh 845-354-2686 (New York)
